channel.title: Flashlight crash
channel.description: Hey nice game, really nostalgi trip here, but to the small problem is that when i click f for my flashlight the client crashes to deskbord, or when i pick up the revolver where you save the guard from the zombie with flashlight on it make it crash to , can play normaly without flashlight but should be nice to see something in the dark areas in the game :slight_smile: . Attached a mdmp. hl2_4104_crash_2012_12_8T23_41_9C0.mdmp (104 KB)

item.title: Flashlight crash
item.dc:creator: puttey
item.description:
Fixed the problem with disabling SLI.

Read full topic

item.title: Flashlight crash
item.dc:creator: puttey
item.description:
Hey nice game, really nostalgi trip here, but to the small problem is that when i click f for my flashlight the client crashes to deskbord, or when i pick up the revolver where you save the guard from the zombie with flashlight on it make it crash to , can play normaly without flashlight but should be nice to see something in the dark areas in the game .

Attached a mdmp.
